item.title: One Hundred Pushups
item.description: <img src="/media/pushups.gif" alt="Photographer: Frank C. Müller" /> <figcaption> <p> Photographer: Frank C. Müller </p> </figcaption> A while back a bunch of people were twittering about the 100 pushup challenge. Thanksgiving was the catalyst for me. I began my quest for better health about a week ago. The premise of the challenge is quite simple. It is a six week program, that if followed, you can do 100 consecutive good form push ups at the end of the program.
